name: AppStoreSettings
desc: Constraints on a user’s App Store settings.

items.name: var denyInAppPurchases: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to deny the user permission to make in-app purchases.

items.name: static let denyInAppPurchases: SettingMetadata<Bool>
items.desc: The metadata associated with the setting to deny in-app purchases.

items.name: var maximumRating: Int?
items.desc: The maximum app rating the user can download.

items.name: static let maximumRating: BoundedSettingMetadata<Int>
items.desc: The metadata associated with the maximum app rating setting.

items.name: var requirePasswordForPurchases: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to require the user’s password to make App Store transactions.

items.name: static let requirePasswordForPurchases: SettingMetadata<Bool>
items.desc: The metadata associated with the setting that requires a password for App Store purchases.
